dcterms:creator: S. Makridakis
M. Hibon
dcterms:description: The monthly industry subset of the M3 competition data consists of 334 univariate time-series with up to 144 time points, where time points occur on a monthly basis. This subset can serve as a proxy for demand on a monthly basis.
dcterms:title: M3 Monthly Industry Subset

dcterms:description: The Corporaci√≥n Favorita Grocery Sales Forecasting dataset consists of sales data across several stores and products, including covariates such as oil prices, location, day of week, month, and holidays. It includes 90,193 distinct time-series with up to 396 time points, where time points occur on a daily basis from 2015 to 2016.
dcterms:title: Favorita Grocery Sales
